    • Uses of ConversionSession in ca.cgjennings.apps.arkham.component

      Methods in ca.cgjennings.apps.arkham.component with parameters of type ConversionSession 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      default void GameComponent.convertFrom​(ConversionSession session)
      Called on a component that is being converted into another component type.
      default void GameComponent.convertTo​(ConversionSession session)
      Called on the replacement component when converting a component to another component type.

    • Uses of ConversionSession in ca.cgjennings.apps.arkham.component.conversion

      Methods in ca.cgjennings.apps.arkham.component.conversion that return ConversionSession 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      ConversionSession ConversionSession.copyAllPortraits​(boolean copyLayouts)
      Copies the portraits from the old component to the new.
      ConversionSession ConversionSession.copyAllSettings()
      Copies all settings from the old component to the new.
      ConversionSession ConversionSession.copyAllSettingsExcept​(String... excludedKeys)
      Copies all settings from the old component to the new, except for the given keys.
      ConversionSession ConversionSession.copyComment()
      Copies the comments of the old component to the new.
      ConversionSession ConversionSession.copyExpansions()
      Copies the expansions from the old component to the new.
      ConversionSession ConversionSession.copyName()
      Copies the name of the old component to the new.
      ConversionSession ConversionSession.copyPortrait​(int index, boolean copyLayout)
      Copies a portrait from the old component to the new.
      ConversionSession ConversionSession.copyPortrait​(int sourceIndex, int targetIndex, boolean copyLayout)
      Copies a portrait from the old component to the new.
      ConversionSession ConversionSession.copySettings​(String... keys)
      Copies the settings for the given keys from the old component to the new.
      ConversionSession ConversionSession.disableAutomaticConversion()
      Disables all automatic conversion steps.
      ConversionSession ConversionSession.disableAutomaticCopyBasics()
      Disables the automatic conversion for component name, comments and expansions.
      ConversionSession ConversionSession.disableAutomaticCopyPortraits()
      Disables the automatic conversion for component portraits.
      ConversionSession ConversionSession.moveSettings​(String... pairs)
      Copies settings from the old component to the new, based on the given key pairs.
      ConversionSession ConversionSession.performAutomaticConversion()
      Performs the enabled automatic conversion steps, then disables all conversion steps.
      ConversionSession ConversionSession.setSettings​(String... keyValuePairs)
      Sets one or more settings on the new component, based on the given (key, value) pairs.
